document.full_text: ivory coast's internationally recognized president called for peace and reconciliation after his rival was arrested with the help of french forces, but he faces a huge task reuniting a country shattered by civil war.
document.title: ouattara urges peace after ivory coast rival held
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's internationally recognized president called for peace and reconciliation after his rival was arrested with the help of french forces, but he faces a huge task reuniting a country shattered by civil war.
